com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle.checks.regexp

Class SinglelineDetector

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle.checks.regexp.SinglelineDetector

  • class SinglelineDetector
extends Object
    A detector that matches individual lines.
